value:
So, you celebrate a festival of
devotion in this world as well?$k$pJust goes to show that no matter
where we come from, the fact that
we care for each other remains true.

Hm? You wish my advice on a gift for
a lady you care for?$k$pWell, if it was up to me... I suppose I'd
send flowers.

Is there somebody you're thinking
about giving a present to? You can
always come to me for advice.

It seems like every shop in town turns
into a candy shop this time of year...
Well, would you like to go see them?

Hector has been a dear friend of mine
since childhood. I'm grateful for his
friendship even as we grow older.$k$pPerhaps this would be a good
opportunity to send him a gift of some
sort...

I've come with greetings from your
friend $Nf. I
have a small gift for you as well.

Have I now gained the strength
to express my feelings?

Ha. Do you suppose this will help
make me more popular?

My apologies... It seems I've been
remiss.

I only grow stronger thanks to the
people I love.

I am Eliwood of Pherae. If you have
the time, would you accompany me
to the Day of Devotion celebration?

Many people say the Day of Devotion
is for celebrating those we have
romantic feelings for...$k$pBut in truth, it's much more than that.
It's a day for expressing your love to
your friends and family as well.$k$pIf people were more compassionate
toward others, there just might be far
less fighting. And then someday...$k$pThe world could become a truly
peaceful place.$k$pI believe the Day of Devotion is also a
wish for peace. Thank you for all
you do, $Nu.$k$pMy gift to you is my undying feeling
of gratitude.
それっ！
えいっ！
うああっ！
At this rate...
Here's a present from me.
You get this.
I'm not losing.
Not as sweet as you think.
I...misjudged...
ええと
Festivals are just wonderful, aren't they? Seeing everybody smile makes me smile too.
Oops, pardon me. I almost ran right into you!
Hector and I have sparred for many years, and we continue to this day.
It seems Roy and Lilina have become rather close. Hector won't like that...
What do I want? Your friendship is enough.
Do you think flowers alone make a good present?
I'd like to get to know you better.
Yes.
Something you want?
Find your courage!
